commands.name: az monitor app-insights workbook identity assign
commands.syntax:
az monitor app-insights workbook identity assign --resource-group
                                                 --resource-name
                                                 [--source-id]
                                                 [--system-assigned {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                 [--user-assigned]

commands.name: az monitor app-insights workbook identity remove
commands.syntax:
az monitor app-insights workbook identity remove --resource-group
                                                 --resource-name
                                                 [--source-id]
                                                 [--system-assigned {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                 [--user-assigned]
